snippet: Leonard Sharp, who began drinking heavily after his marriage crumbled, says he has become closer with his children again. He hopes to become a substance abuse counselor.
abstract: Community Service Society, one of seven agencies supported by The New York Times Neediest Cases Fund, helps Leonard Sharp purchase clothing, glasses and a monthly MetroCard for himself.
